/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling intersection in Beijing, China. The vantage point is from a high angle, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The intersection is teeming with life, with cars and buses navigating their way through the roads. The roads themselves are lined with trees and buildings, adding a touch of urban greenery to the cityscape. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a bright and sunny day. The image is bathed in natural daylight, highlighting the colors and details of the scene.
